definitions.definition: The way a person holds and positions their body .
One's attitude or the social or political position one takes towards an issue or another person.
The position of someone or something relative to another; position; situation.

main_definition: The way a person holds and positions their body .
secondary_definitions: One's attitude or the social or political position one takes towards an issue or another person.
( rare ) The position of someone or something relative to another; position; situation.
